attributes.action: End Schools in Edinburgh on Friday 18th December
attributes.additional_details: This is because if schools end on the 18th it will give children at least a 4/5 day period to isolate before the Christmas period. This will decrease the risk of potential passing the virus to elderly relatives and will mean more families can meet elderly loved ones.
attributes.background: End schools in Edinburgh on Friday 18th December not Tuesday 22nd December. This is because if schools end on the 18th it will give children at least a 4/5 day period to isolate before the Christmas period.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
